data.eml:eml: Caayguara, a new genus of huntsman spiders from the Brazilian Atlantic Forest (Araneae: Sparassidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rheims, Cristina A. (2010): Caayguara, a new genus of huntsman spiders from the Brazilian Atlantic Forest (Araneae: Sparassidae). Zootaxa 2630: 1-29, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.198317
